intro: Orthosia thymifolia, commonly known as the thyme-leaved orthosia, is a perennial herbaceous plant native to the Mediterranean region. Orthosia thymifolia thrives in well-drained soils and full sun, making it a hardy addition to rock gardens and wildflower meadows.
